item.title: Artificial Suspects
item.description: The artificial intelligence model in the learning process condenses not only knowledge but also biases. And not only those contained in the quality of the dataset itself (from whom, for whom, why?), but also in the deeper layers of human culture. The result is the ability of AI models not only to generate but also to reduce. In the case of GPT4o, this is the ability to represent text/words in the form of 3072 numerical parameters.
